short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flappy Bird game 👾 offline version on your Google Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⬇️ Easy to set up ⬇️:

1. Install and pin📌 the extension to Chrome.
2. Click the Flappy Bird icon to open the Flappy Bird popup.
3. Tap on the popup or press "Spacebar" to start.

✨ Features ✨

1. No Internet required, no ADS 🚫, and 100% free 🆓.
2. Keyboard ⌨️ access, press the spacebar to start playing.

Play the Flappy Bird 👾 Classic Offline and give yourself a break once in a while.
